front.title: Multihoming with IPv6-to-IPv6 Network Prefix Translation (NPTv6)

abstract.t: This memo describes an architecture for sites that are homed to multiple upstream providers. The architecture described herein uses IPv6-to-IPv6 Network Prefix Translation (NPTv6) to achieve redundancy, transport-layer survivability, load sharing and address independence. This memo updates Section 2.4 of RFC 6296.
